meanings.definition: Not belonging to or affiliated with a league.
meanings.sent1: The nonleague team played against a local school team.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the nonleague tournaments because they were more relaxed.
meanings.sent3: The nonleague players wore mismatched socks for good luck.
meanings.sent4: The nonleague status gave the team a sense of independence.
meanings.sent5: The nonleague competition was fierce and unpredictable.

meanings.definition: A sports team or organization that is not part of a league.
meanings.sent1: The nonleague had a friendly match with a neighboring town's team.
meanings.sent2: Fans of the nonleague often showed their support by attending every game.
meanings.sent3: The nonleague surprised everyone by winning the championship.
meanings.sent4: Being a nonleague meant they had to organize their own matches.
meanings.sent5: The nonleague team's dedication was evident in their performance.
